divs: Sighting DetailsAbout 8a 1991 a beautiful summer morning, Paloma Ca. My mother, sister, brother and my self were out side enjoying a cup of coffee on another sunny California morning, as I was gazing at a spot in the bright blue sky about ��� mile above us, when a translucent cloudy dirty spot appeared which continued to grow in size and dept of color , I was puzzling over this when a Ufo appeared, I start yelling look look to my Sis and Mom, who missed the event because they had their backs toward the translucent opening in the sky, but my brother who was facing the same way I was saw the Ufo as the same time as Im yelling for them to look, then the UFO moving what appeared to be thousands of miles an hour appeared from the south in a zigzagging pattern enters the translucent dirty spot and disappears from sight and another UFO come shooting out of the same translucent dirty spot. After the second craft appeared from within the cloudy translucent brownish spot and shot off to the west. Then the dirty cloudy tanslucent spot quickly disappeared.
Summary: We have seen numerous UFO Sighting in this area over past 50yrs
trends: There have been no other sightings in Paloma
This sighting has never been favorited.
